renderpass.code:
#define S(x,r) smoothstep( 2e2/R.y, 0., length(vec2(x-l*cos(a),l*sin(a))) -r )//
void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 u) {
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,
          U = u+u - R;
    float l = length(U)*30./R.y,  /* .955 = 3/pi  1.05 = pi/3 */
          a = ( mod( .955*atan(U.y,U.x)-.5, 2.) - 1. ) *1.05,
          c = S(15.5,10.5);
    O.r = max( 0., S(12.,15.) - S(,3.) - c
                   - max( 0., 1. - (abs(a)-.1)*R.y*.1 )
             ) + S(,14.) - S(,10.5)
               + S(15.,9.) - c; }                                 /*






// --- 311 chars 

#define S(x,r) smoothstep( 2e2/R.y, 0., length(U-vec2(x,0)) -r )//
#define mainImage( O, u )                                       \
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,                                   \
          U = u+u - R;                                          \
    float l = length(U)*30./R.y,                                \
          a = ( mod( .955*atan(U.y,U.x)-.5,2.) - 1. ) *1.05, c; \
    U = l* vec2(cos(a),sin(a));                                 \
    c = S(15.5,10.5);                                           \
    O.r = max( 0., - S(0,3.) + S(12,15.) - c                    \
                  -max( 0., 1. - (abs(a)-.1)*R.y*.1 )           \
             ) + S(0,14.) - S(0,10.5)                           \
               + S(15,9.) - c                                  /*






// --- 345 chars 

#define S(v) smoothstep( 2e2/R.y, 0., v )                      //
#define L(x) length(U-vec2(x,0))                               //
#define mainImage( O, u )                                       \
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,                                   \
          U = u+u - R,                                          \
          l = length(U)*30./R,                                  \
          a = ( mod( .955*atan(U.y,U.x)-.5,2.) - R/R ) *1.05;   \
    U = l.y* vec2(cos(a.y),sin(a.y));                           \
    O.r  = max(0., - S(L(0)-3.) + S( L(12)-15. ) -S( L(15.5)-10.5 ) \
                   -S((abs(a.y)-.1)*R.y/20.) );                 \
    O.r +=     S(L(0)-14.) - S(L(0)-10.5)                       \
                           - S( L(15.5)-10.5 )+ S( L(15)-9. )  /*
/**/
renderpass.name: Image
